items.short_desc: The bowling all-rounder was replaced by Shahbaz Nadeem in the first eleven.

items.short_desc: The 23-year-old had slipped on the marble floor of the Chepauk dressing room on Tuesday, thereby jarring his right wrist.

items.short_desc: Here are the stats that will help you stay ahead of the competition as #INDvENG promises to produce plenty of goods, starting tomorrow!

items.short_desc: Numbers that might help you win better in Bangladesh vs West Indies first​ Test.
items.asset_title: Numbers That Help You Win | Bangladesh vs West Indies

items.short_desc: The much-awaited home series for Team India​ begins on 3rd February when they take on England​ at Chennai. We preview and pick the players you can count on.
items.asset_title: Timeout with SportsAdda EP9: India vs England 1st Test preview

items.short_desc: Watch the Aussie legend, Brett Lee summarizing the iconic #AUSvIND series.
items.transcript: Watch the Aussie legend, Brett Lee summarizing the iconic #AUSvIND series.
items.asset_title: Australia vs India Test Series 2020-21 | Brett's Summary

items.short_desc: With the series tied at 1-1, we move to Brisbane for the decider of the Border-Gavaskar trophy. In this episode, we discuss team news, possible playing XI and the players to watch out for.
items.asset_title: Timeout with SportsAdda EP5: 4th #AUSvIND Test Preview

items.short_desc: From Vinoo Mankad to Ravindra Jadeja, we highlight the Indian bowlers who excelled with the ball in an India-England Test
items.asset_title: Three times Indian bowlers absolutely dominated England

items.short_desc: SportsAdda's brand ambassador Brett Lee picks four players who he thinks could be the standout performers in the upcoming India-England Test series.
items.asset_title: Brett’s watch list: Players who can deliver a Man of the Match performance

items.short_desc: From Kerala's Mohammed Azharuddeen to Baroda's Lukman Meriwala, here are five players who can land a lucrative Indian T20 League contract during the auction.
items.asset_title: Syed Mushtaq Ali Trophy 2021: Five players who can get Indian T20 League contracts

items.short_desc: The India-England rivalry intertwines with their early success in Test cricket and their eventual rise as a modern powerhouse in the format. We revisit the four games where the Men in Blue stamped their authority over England.
items.asset_title: Four instances when India outclassed England in Tests

items.short_desc: From Chris Lynn to Jonny Bairstow, we take a closer look at the top three batsmen who have mastered the art of batting in the 10-overs competition.
items.asset_title: Top three knocks in Abu Dhabi T10 League

items.short_desc: SportsAdda's brand ambassador Brett Lee picks four players who he thinks could be the standout performers in the Big Bash League 2020-21 playoffs.
items.asset_title: Brett’s watch list: Players to watch during BBL playoffs

items.short_desc: The Australian skipper was released by Team Bangalore after an underwhelming outing in the Indian T20 League last season.
items.asset_title: Indian T20 League 2021 auction: 3 teams who should go for Aaron Finch

items.short_desc: Steve Smith was released by Rajasthan recently, and these three teams can benefit from his services.
items.asset_title: Indian T20 League 2021 auction: 3 teams who should go for Steve Smith

items.short_desc: The Australian all-rounder will be available in the Indian T20 League 2021 auction, scheduled to take place in February
items.asset_title: Indian T20 League 2021 auction: 3 teams who should go for Glenn Maxwell

items.short_desc: Paine has often been termed as a ‘temporary captain’ and this might be the right time for Cricket Australia to look for someone with a better leadership quality.
items.asset_title: It’s time for Australia to move on from Tim Paine

items.short_desc: The eight Indian T20 League franchises have been asked to finalise all their retentions by January 20.
items.asset_title: Indian T20 League auction: Players who could be retained by each franchise

items.short_desc: Syed Mushtaq Ali Trophy is a platform for talented batsmen to explore their potential on the field, and we highlight three players who outshone the rest.
items.asset_title: Three most memorable batting performances in Syed Mushtaq Ali Trophy
